template.name: SUT

transition.label: cmt_array[c]==cu+10 || cu==0
dele_cmt?

checks whether the user is the owner. 's' can be 0 (User) or 1 (Reader). To make sure that 0 does not mistaken with null, in the cmt_array I add the userid+10. So, the value of cmt_array when is empty(null)is 0, otherwise is 10 (userid 0 +10)or 11.
cu==0
edit_ar?
Current user is the owner of the article.
cu==0
delete_ar?
CurrentUser is the owner of article.

dele_cmt?

checks whether the user is the owner. 's' can be 0 (User) or 1 (Reader). To make sure that 0 does not mistaken with null, in the cmt_array I add the userid+10. So, the value of cmt_array when is empty(null)is 0, otherwise is 10 (userid 0 +10)or 11.
cu==su
edit_ar?
Current user is the owner of the article.
cu==su
delete_ar?
CurrentUser is the owner of article.

template.name: M0_u1
template.declaration: // single user, adding single article and single comment

template.name: M1user_1Art_mulCmt
template.declaration: // single article with multiple comments from 2 users

transition.label: numOfComInArt[sa]<max_art
add_cmt!
number of comments in an article can not exceed more than 2.
user_articles[0]<max_art
add_ar!
cu=0
number of articles for this user is limited to 2.

add_cmt!
number of comments in an article can not exceed more than 2.
user_articles[1]<max_art
add_ar!
cu=1
number of articles for this user is limited to 2.
